description: This procurement is to purchase "Rack Power Distribution Units" following SA Holders who are related to the SA listed below. There is no security requirement and the minimum corporate resource security required is NA.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Rack Power Distribution Units

### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) / Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) is seeking proposals for the supply of Rack Power Distribution Units.

### Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: W3330-24-371
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-11-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-30T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-11-30

### Procurement Information
* Category: Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories (32130000)
* UNSPSC: 32130000
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity
* Name: DND / CAF
* Address: 60 Moodie Dr., Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
* Contact Person: CIO Gp Procurement / DPI Groupe d'approvisionnement
* Email: IMBIDS.OFFRESGI@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 558-4652

### Description of Work
The contracting authority requires Rack Power Distribution Units. The tender is open to Electrical & Electronic Products Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under Stream two (2) for services in the National Capital Region.

### Security Requirement
No security requirements are specified.

### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the selection criterion for this tender.
